import { useEffect, useState } from "react" import { AddWorksheetInput } from "./AddWorksheetInput" export const WorksheetInputForm = ({ worksheetForm, setWorksheetForm }) => { const [worksheet, setWorksheet] = useState([]) // const [html, setHtml] = useState("") const handleUserInput = (event) => { const copyOfWorksheet = [...worksheet] if (copyOfWorksheet.find((question) => question.id === parseInt(event.target.id))) { const id = parseInt(event.target.id) const name = event.target.name const value = event.target.value const updatedCopy = copyOfWorksheet.map((question) => { if (question.id === id) { return ( { ...question, [name]: value } ) } return question }) setWorksheet(updatedCopy) } else { const id = parseInt(event.target.id) const name = event.target.name const value = event.target.value const object = { "id": id, [name]: value } copyOfWorksheet.push(object) setWorksheet(copyOfWorksheet) } } useEffect(() => { const copy = { ...worksheetForm } copy.questionAndAnswers = worksheet setWorksheetForm(copy) }, [worksheet]) return ( <> {/* */}
) }
